import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify' export const TaskPage = () => { var style = { width: "90px" } var style1 = { visibility: "visible; animation-delay: 0.1s; animation-name: fadeInUp;" } var style2 = { visibility: "visible; animation-delay: 0.5s; animation-name: zoomIn;" } var style3 = { visibility: "visible; animation-delay: 0.1s; animation-name: fadeInUp;" } var style4 = { height: "250px" } var style5 = { height: "250px" } var style6 = { height: "48px" } var style7 = { visibility: "visible; animation-delay: 0.1s; animation-name: fadeIn" } var style8 = { visibility: "visible; animation-delay: 0.3s; animation-name: fadeInUp" } var navigate = useNavigate() const [users, setusers] = useState(); const { id } = useParams(); const getApi = () => { axios.get("http://localhost:5000/task/task/" + id).then((res) => { console.log(res.data.project) setusers(res.data) }).catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } useEffect(() => { getApi() // navigate("/admindashboard") }, []) const updateProject = (id) => { axios.put("http://localhost:5000/task/task/" + id).then((res) => { console.log(res.data.project[0]) setusers(res.data.project[0]) }).catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } const deleteProject = (id) => { axios.delete("http://localhost:5000/task/task/" + id).then((res) => { getApi() }).catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } return (
